title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Get Him, Drag Him In The Car"
description: One of the members of the Rampers gets hit and their leader, Jerry Pappa, is next. Jerry goes to the police for protection instead of his fellow Rampers, so they immediately elect Sammy as their new leader. Beef between Jerry and Sammy escalates.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
